Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 13-2009. A 54-year-old 
woman with respiratory failure and a cavitary lesion in the lung.
Weinblatt ME(1), Abbott GF, Koreishi AF.

Author information:
(1)Division of Rheumatology, Immunology, and Allergy, Brigham and Women's 
Hospital, Boston, USA.

Erratum in
    N Engl J Med. 2010 Apr 8;362(14):1350.
